name: Quarantine
0:
”Alexa, open my quarantine”
”Start my quarantine for ten days”
”How much time left for my quarantine to end”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my quarantine
des: The Quarantine helps you to control your quarantine time, use this skill to start your quarantine, adjust the number of days of isolation and always check when there is doubt about how much time is left to end.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
